contracts.name: MetaCoin

getBalance(address).notice: Returns MetaCoin balance for a given address

getBalanceInEth(address).notice: Returns equivalent Ether balance for a given address

sendCoin(address,uint256).notice: Transfer coins from sender to receiver

sendCoin(address,uint256).details: This is just a simple example of a coin-like contract. It is not standards compatible and cannot be expected to talk to other coin/token contracts. If you want to create a standards-compliant token, see: [ConsenSys/Tokens](https://github.com/ConsenSys/Tokens). Cheers!

contracts.name: Set
SafeMath
Claimable

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

claimOwnership().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

contracts.name: Destructible

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

contracts.name: ConvertLib

convert(uint256,uint256).notice: Converts given value to Ether value

contracts.name: Pausable

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

contracts.name: MyLib

convert(uint256,uint256).notice: Converts given value to Ether value

contracts.name: Ownable

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
